items.sentence: Tom isn\'t a student here. He\'s one of the teachers.
I don\'t have enough money to buy everything we need.
I don\'t think Tom would ever do something like that.
I think we\'d better wait for another thirty minutes.
Tom never lets his children watch TV after 10:00 p.m.
Tom never really thought about those kinds of things.
Tom never told Mary where he hid the stolen diamonds.
Tom opened the door a crack to let in some fresh air.
I always thought that Tom and Mary would get married.
I can\'t read that number. There are too many zeroes.
I can\'t remember the last time that I saw Tom smile.
You should tell Tom that he doesn\'t have to do that.
You should tell Tom you aren\'t planning on swimming.
You\'ll find our house at the end of the next street.
Tom told me that you\'re very difficult to deal with.
Tom took Mary\'s car keys away because she was drunk.
Tom noticed Mary hadn\'t even started to cook dinner.
We were worried because we weren\'t getting any news.
We\'re planning to go to Australia for our honeymoon.
Tom didn\'t say anything about where he\'d come from.
